skillTree.localised_description: The horses of Norsca live for battle, even choosing to graze on the bones of the fallen over grass.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

skillTree.localised_description: Marauder mobs are awarded even greater mobility when riding their crude chariots of bone and wood, lashed together with the guts and sinew of the vanquished.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: They say she was born amidst crashing waves and war cries, and never once wept.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

skillTree.localised_description: Her eyes scan the night for foes — few slip past her watch and live to boast.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +3 for Shield Maidens
	
	Note: Requires the Expanded Roster: Norsca mod to be activated.
	(Hero's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Shield Maidens
	
	Note: Requires the Expanded Roster: Norsca mod to be activated.
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Hard as permafrost and twice as unyielding, she leads without doubt or fear.

ui_effects.localised_text: Can not engage in melee combat when actively commanding the shield wall

attributes.bullet_text: This unit cannot target enemy units and initiate melee attacks

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can never have its Melee Attack reduced during battle.

skillTree.localised_description: The maiden swears a binding oath, her loyalty etched deeper than steel or stone.
When she speaks, warriors listen. When she cries war, they charge.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
The desire to wreak havoc is innate, brought about not by choice but by sheer force of being.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
Beneath her banner, the tide holds. Even the sea cannot break her command.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
It is never enough. The food, the drink, the slaughter. It is never, ever enough.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Blink and you die.
Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +500 metres without incurring any time penalty

backgroundSkills.localised_description: An assured air instils great confidence in your followers.
Such an ugly scar is always memorable.
Clearly a veteran of some heroic deed.
Skulk and sneak or shadow and stalk, theirs is a guileful nature.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Shares the intellect of a River Troll.

effects.description:
All Climate penalties are nullified
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Others may call it decisive, but being uncompromising can be a weakness as well as a strength.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can never have its Melee Attack reduced during battle.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!
